arts.ttl: Heracles strike late to down Heerenveen
arts.sum: Mario Engels scored a late winner as Heracles Almelo defeated Heerenveen 2-1 on Friday evening. Both sides went into the game on the back of wins but it was Heracles who began the clash well. After half an hour, the hosts got the opener they deserved as Damon Mirani headed in a corner.
